    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109808</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen bond between an amino group and a carboxyl group</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffbindung zwischen einer Aminogruppe und 
einer Karboxyl- Gruppe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obligation d'hydrogène entre un groupe 
d'animés et un groupe carboxylique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligação do hidrogênio entre um amino grupo e um
grupo carboxyl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legame dell'idrogeno fra un gruppo amminico e un 
gruppo carbossilico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεσμός υδρογόνου μεταξύ μιας αμινο ομάδας και μιας 
καρβοξυλικής ομάδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enlace del hidrógeno entre un grupo amino y un 
grupo carboxyl</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the fourth of a series of four diagrams showing chemical bonds. Hydrogen bonds can form between groups in molecules with dipoles.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carboxyl groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydroxyl groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polar molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das Viertel einer Reihe von vier 
Diagrammen, die chemische Bindungen zeigen. Wasserstoffbindungen
können zwischen Gruppen in den Molekülen mit Dipolen sich bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le quart d'une série de quatre diagrammes 
montrant les obligations chimiques. Les obligations 
d'hydrogène peuvent former entre les groupes en molécules avec des 
dipöles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o fourth de uma série de quatro diagramas
que mostram ligações químicas. As ligações do hidrogênio 
podem dar forma entre grupos nas moléculas com dipoles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il quarto di una serie di quattro 
schemi che mostrano i legami chimici. I legami dell'idrogeno 
possono formare fra i gruppi in molecole con i dipoli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι το τέταρτο μιας σειράς τεσσάρων 
διαγραμμάτων που εμφανίζουν χημικούς δεσμούς. Οι δεσμοί 
υδρογόνου μπορούν να διαμορφώσουν μεταξύ των ομάδων στα μόρια με
τα δίπολα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el cuarto de una serie de cuatro 
diagramas que muestran vínculos químicos. Los enlaces del 
hidrógeno pueden formar entre los grupos en moléculas con los 
dipolos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
